items.title: Match of the Day
items.summary: Highlights of nine midweek Premier League matches, including Manchester City v Brighton.

items.title: 'Like a movie' - Semenyo enjoys fairytale farewell
items.summary: Antoine Semenyo could not have dreamed of a better ending to his Bournemouth career as his late winner against Spurs ends the Cherries' long winless run.

items.title: Man City latest: Draw 'another punch in the ribs' for City in title race, says Neville
Frank moet zich verantwoorden vanwege Arsenal-beker: 'Een beetje triest'
items.summary: Liever had Thomas Frank enkel vragen beantwoord over de wedstrijd van Tottenham Hotspur tegen Bournemouth, die hij verloor. Echter gingen de eerste vragen over waarom hij uit een Arsenal-bekertje dronk.

items.title: A Premier League CLASSIC! Newcastle beat Leeds with 102nd-minute winner!
items.summary: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Newcastle's win against Leeds in the Premier League.

items.title: Bournemouth-manager neemt afscheid van Semenyo: 'Hij zal enorm gemist worden'
items.summary: Andoni Iraola houdt er sterk rekening mee dat Antoine Semenyo zijn laatste wedstrijd voor Bournemouth heeft gespeeld. De aanvaller schoot zijn ploeg woensdagavond in extremis naar een overwinning op Tottenham Hotspur en heeft daarmee zijn droomafscheid te pakken. Een dezer dagen tekent hij bij Manchester City.

items.title: Man City hoeft volgens Guardiola even niet aan de landstitel te denken
items.summary: Manchester City hoeft voorlopig niet na te denken over de landstitel. Dat vond manager Pep Guardiola, nadat zijn ploeg gelijkspeelde in eigen huis tegen Brighton & Hove Albion. De Catalaan was wel verheugd met het optreden van een piepjonge centrumverdediger en wilde nog weinig zeggen over de aanstaande transfer van Antoine Semenyo.

items.title: Rosenior unready to coach Chelsea loss at Fulham
items.summary: Liam Rosenior chose not to take charge of Chelsea for the first time in Wednesday's Premier League clash against Fulham because of the "difficult time-frame" between his appointment on Tuesday and the game at Craven Cottage.

items.title: Spurs boss Frank 'didn't notice' Arsenal coffee cup
items.summary: Tottenham Hotspur boss Thomas Frank has said he didn't notice he was drinking out of an Arsenal cup ahead of the clash at Bournemouth, adding that it would have been "absolutely stupid" for him to do so.

items.title: United draw at lowly Burnley after Amorim exit
items.summary: Manchester United began life after Ruben Amorim with a 2-2 draw at struggling Burnley as substitute Jaidon Anthony's strike denied Darren Fletcher victory in his first, and perhaps only, match as interim boss.

items.title: Man City drop more points in draw with Brighton
items.summary: Title-chasing Manchester City dropped points for a third successive game as they were held to a 1-1 draw by Brighton on Wednesday.

items.title: Sesko scores twice but Burnley fight back to hold Man Utd
items.summary: Manchester United are denied victory in their first game since the sacking of head coach Ruben Amorim as relegation-threatened Burnley fight back to claim only their third point in 12 games.

items.title: Semenyo strikes late as Bournemouth edge out Spurs
items.summary: Antoine Semenyo scores a stunning late winner in what is likely his final game for Bournemouth as they beat Tottenham in dramatic fashion at Vitality Stadium.

items.title: Wilson goal helps Fulham beat 10-man Chelsea
items.summary: New Chelsea head coach Liam Rosenior watched from the stands as Harry Wilson's fine finish condemns his team to defeat by west London rivals Fulham at Craven Cottage.

items.title: Newcastle‚Äôs Harvey Barnes hits 102nd-minute winner in 4-3 Leeds thriller
items.summary: Tactical anarchy reigned supreme on a night of chaotic, bewilderingly thrilling, drama played out amid freezing conditions. Not that the on-pitch temperature ever seemed to drop below boiling point as a renascent Leeds led three times yet departed with their seven match unbeaten run at end and hearts broken by Harvey Barnes‚Äôs volleyed stoppage time winner for Newcastle. Long before the end though three things were clear: Daniel Farke‚Äôs visitors are surely far too good to go down, Howe‚Äôs expensively assembled team have developed some alarming structural flaws and this was one of the finest matches staged at St James‚Äô Park in recent years. Continue reading...

items.title: Geen schokeffect bij Man Utd, zinderende ontknoping op St James's Park
items.summary: Het ontslag van Ruben Amorim bij Manchester United, heeft woensdagavond niet tot het gewenste schokeffect geleid. Tijdens het debuut van interim-manager Darren Fletcher kwamen The Red Devils niet verder dan gelijkspel tegen Burnley. Quilindschy Hartman keerde terug in de wedstrijdselectie van The Clarets maar mocht niet invallen.

items.title: Everton latest: Moyes slams Keane‚Äôs ‚Äòridiculous‚Äô red card for ‚Äòhair pull‚Äô
Newcastle door laatste winnende goal ooit gemeten langs Leeds
items.summary: Woensdagavond staan er weer veel mooie potjes op het programma. Er zijn liefst acht duels in de Premier League, er wordt gevoetbald in de Serie A en Barcelona speelt de halve finale van de Spaanse Supercopa tegen Athletic Bilbao. Volg de duels in de VI Live.

items.title: Premier League as it happened: United draws against Burnley in Fletcher's first game
items.summary: Manchester United get a 2-2 draw against Burnley in the first match of interim boss Darren Fletcher, on a day full of Premier League matches.

items.title: Darren Fletcher‚Äôs Manchester United held by Burnley despite Sesko double
items.summary: Manchester United‚Äôs Darren Fletcher failed to produce what the interim manager, fans and executives craved: a cathartic victory to move the club on quickly from the recent turbulence. United‚Äôs biggest plus was Benjamin Sesko, whose two goals doubled his season tally, plus the support being in good cheer despite the inability to dispatch the division‚Äôs second-bottom side. Continue reading...
